on my profile the random qustion thingy won't let me type in over 150 chaicters. I GOT MAD so what if I'm long winded I don't did to have a computer tell'in me that!!!so here is what I wanted to say , the qustion was:your going to the moon what have you forgot? my answer:well I remerbered my flash light, camping gear ,a tent,t.v.,beef jreky,my bible,gamecube,legos, pixie stick's,my cam...................wait I'm going to the moon ???well that would exlain why I have a space suit on .

tell me what you think of my stuff

my fiends oh what can I say one of them thinks his black but his not . and the rest of my close fiends are ethier nerds geeks and people from my robotics thing that I do it's called B.E.S.T. [boosting engineing science and technolgy ] the team that I'm on is the homeschool warriors and we just about kick tail evey year. boooyaa .sorry I had to put that in there.thier mosty silly my fiends are . this one fiend that I have thinks of evey thing that I do but he does it frist, so ya know I'm tell'n him my ideas and his like "I thought of that last mounth " and than I hit myself in the head.and than I have a fiend that is just like me but his not a Geek .and than there's this guy I know who's just like me but he has way more money.

I went to the movies on friday to see spiderman 2 it was good but why did they have "rain drops keep falling on my head" in there IT WAS SO CORNY I was thinking shot me now just kill me and get this song over with . and than other parts of the movie looked like a 50's horor movie that was a bit chesey . but those parts aren't to bad part of it is sort of cool like that . it had a bit ok a lot more humor .but the movie is really cool . and I like that they Finley got Mary Jane to call Peter Parker tiger .

WELCOME to the geekist blog in the mid west. yeeeeeeha I'm hypotenuse_the_3rd . LET me tell you about my camp that I went to . Ya know I'm hang'in with these hot but oh so nerdy chicks there's this girl Chapel that likes me so I ask her out she doesn't give me an answer.So her friend tells me get her jealous ,than she will go out with me .BAD IDEA.Than I started to like the girl I was making Chapel jealous with, you might think "no harm there" but she has a boyfriend that's six inches taller than me luckfuly I did not meat him . AND THAN the girl that told me to make Chapel jealous start's to like me but she has boyfiend that right there while she hugging me and just this week broke up with her boyfiend. I hope you think my life is as funny as I think it is .
